sentences.en: Chalk marks deface the wall of the house.
sentences.cn: 粉笔痕迹破坏墙壁的外观.
在钞票上乱涂乱画是违法的。

sentences.en: Most of the monuments had been broken or defaced.
sentences.cn: 大多数纪念碑都被破坏或遭污损。

sentences.en: No person shall wilfully damage injure or deface any of the Company's property.
sentences.cn: 任何人不得故意损坏、破坏或涂污公司的任何财产.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate effect of sandwich restoration on repairing tooth deface and preserving the gingival.
sentences.cn: 观察夹心板修复体恢复牙齿形态功能与维护牙龈健康的效果.

sentences.en: The holy tide of Christmas all other doth deface.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节的圣潮,其他的一切将被感染.

sentences.en: The youths used spray paint to deface buildings during the riots.
sentences.cn: 这些年轻人在抗争时用喷漆污损了建筑物的外观.

sentences.en: Thoughtless boy have deface the desk by marking on them.
sentences.cn: 轻率的男孩子们在桌面上乱画而把桌面弄坏了.

sentences.en: To destroy or deface ( public or private property ) willfully or maliciously.
sentences.cn: 破坏故意地或恶意地破坏或毁损 ( 公共或私人财产 )

trans.tran_en: to spoil the surface or appearance of something, especially by writing on it or breaking it

trans.tran_cn: 损伤外观，丑化，使失面子
